column2: until one of the two servers blamed my friend for changing her order. We ordered Bosscat Burger but a doughnut burger came out so we told our server that the food came out wrong. As it was so loud inside
column3: I would've understood if the server apologized right away but instead she rolled her eyes
column5: right??" We were very startled by the way she reacted. Why would we even say that we ordered something else if the food we ordered came out right? It was a very unpleasant experience and she repeated herself again at the end when we asked for the check. "I swear you guys ordered doughnut burger." ... I just don't know what to say anymore.
